title: Subaru adopts wireless Android Auto and CarPlay, starting with 2023 Outback
content:
Wireless Android Auto has been around for a few years, but it’s been slow to adoption from carmakers. This week, Subaru announced it will adopt both wireless Android Auto and Apple CarPlay in its 2023 Outback.

more…

The post Subaru adopts wireless Android Auto and CarPlay, starting with 2023 Outback appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Starting with the 2023 Outback, Subaru is finally adopting support for wireless Android Auto and Apple CarPlay.
